title: Swing Kitchen - Operngasse
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Western, Fast food, Take-out
description: The 2nd restaurant of Karl Schillinger's vegan fast food chain, this one opened Dec 2015. Serves primarily burgers plus wraps, salads, sides, sweets, and drinks. Fair trade coffee. Plays swing music in the background. Does not use plastic - everything which looks like plastic is CO2-neutral and bio-degradable, plus sources electricity from renewable energy.
